snippet: The man once lauded as "Japan's Beethoven" bowed repeatedly and apologized Friday at his first media appearance since it was revealed last month that his famed musical compositions were ghostwritten and he wasn't completely deaf....

headline.print_headline: Man Lauded as Japan Beethoven Sorry for Fake Work
headline.main: Man Lauded as Japan Beethoven Sorry for Fake Work

lead_paragraph: The man once lauded as "Japan's Beethoven" bowed repeatedly and apologized Friday at his first media appearance since it was revealed last month that his famed musical compositions were ghostwritten and he wasn't completely deaf.
